Scholz says EU summit will seek agreement on aid for UkraineGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Wednesday the aim of a European Union special summit next week is for all EU member states to agree to financial aid for Ukraine. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 18:13:58 GMT 3SH7DDBHS5JB5HF2I72PZWJPSM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/scholz-says-eu-summit-will-seek-agreement-aid-ukraine-2024-01-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Slovak PM reaffirms support for Ukraine's EU membership bidSlovak Prime Minister Robert Fico reaffirmed support for Kyiv's bid to join the European Union at talks in Ukraine on Wednesday, but said policy differences remained on issues including NATO accession. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 18:09:33 GMT DWVSAA46GFNQNA2W6EDQJEIO3E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/slovak-pm-reaffirms-support-ukraines-eu-membership-bid-2024-01-24/Reuters世界欧洲
As Trump-Biden rematch looks likely, Wall Street maps out election impactSome investors are already gaming out how the U.S. 2024 presidential election could impact markets, as former president Donald Trump’s victory in the New Hampshire Republican primary brings him closer to a rematch with Democratic President Joe Biden Wed, 24 Jan 2024 18:06:22 GMT HVFPZE3S35JKJMI4HBLUN5D2WA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/wall-street-maps-out-2024-election-impact-trump-vs-biden-looks-likely-2024-01-24/David Randall, Lewis Krauskopf市场宏观问题
Six dead in Rio Tinto plane crash in Canada's Northwest TerritoriesSix people were killed after a small plane carrying global miner Rio Tinto's workers crashed near Fort Smith in Canada's remote Northwest Territories (NWT) on Tuesday, the NWT Coroner Service said on Wednesday. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 17:54:48 GMT 233QJMBQMVP3TJANLOPSGWJE4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/six-dead-rio-tinto-plane-crash-canadas-northwest-territories-2024-01-24/Nia Williams世界美洲
NATO's largest exercise since Cold War kicks offThe U.S. Navy dock landing ship Gunston Hall left port on Wednesday to mark the first movement for the largest NATO exercise since the Cold War, officials said. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 17:47:13 GMT OPFKDES5CBKLJMTCJU7HHNOYMY https://www.reuters.com/world/natos-largest-exercise-since-cold-war-kicks-off-2024-01-24/Reuters世界
World Court to rule on Gaza emergency measures in Israel genocide case on Jan 26Judges at the International Court of Justice (ICJ) will rule on Friday whether or not they will grant emergency measures against Israel following accusations by South Africa that the Israeli military operation in Gaza is a state-led genocide. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 17:39:31 GMT WV72DSKDKBKDNK4S52LLJUPAJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-court-rule-gaza-emergency-measures-israel-genocide-case-jan-26-2024-01-24/Reuters世界中东
Russia seeks emergency UN Security Council session on plane crashRussian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said Russia has called for an emergency U.N. Security Council session on Wednesday to discuss the crash of a Russian plane that Moscow says was carrying captured Ukrainian soldiers to a prisoner exchange. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 17:37:25 GMT KG6RZJ5PVROD5GPFVYNNWKY2X4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-seeks-emergency-un-security-council-session-plane-crash-2024-01-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Commission seeks information on India in Canada foreign interference probeAn independent commission probing alleged foreign interference in Canada asked the Trudeau government on Wednesday to share information about possible meddling in elections by India, a development that could aggravate already-tense Ottawa-New Delhi relations. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 16:57:15 GMT TXDESZO65NOQJJLE6ZMUTRPINA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/commission-seeks-information-india-canada-foreign-interference-probe-2024-01-24/Reuters世界美洲
Italy's Meloni fuels friction with Stellantis over local productionA car being sold as an "Italian jewel" needs to be made in Italy, Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said, fuelling friction between the government and Stellantis as they hold difficult talks over a long-term plan for the national auto industry. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 16:15:47 GMT PX373BGJUVLT7L6YBGDCRBIJLU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/cars-sold-an-italian-jewel-must-be-made-italy-pm-tells-stellantis-2024-01-24/Reuters世界欧洲
US Senate panel backs 'big hammer' plan to seize Russian assets to help UkraineA U.S. Senate committee approved legislation on Wednesday that would help set the stage for the United States to confiscate Russian assets and hand them over to Ukraine for rebuilding after the destruction of the nearly two-year-long war. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 16:14:32 GMT PZRN2WGJJBJDBKA3LICBUPWVHU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-senate-panel-steps-toward-seizing- Russian-assets-help-ukraine-2024-01-24/Patricia Zengerle世界
Thou shall be a whistleblower but not an anonymous one, new Vatican rules sayThe Vatican, which over the centuries has codified all aspects of faith, morals, doctrine and dissent, on Wednesday announced a new entry - the rights and responsibilities of a whistleblower. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:34:41 GMT 2FLNXG343BKHBLXWYFJDZYZGBI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/thou-shall-be-whistleblower-not-an-anonymous-one-new-vatican-rules-say-2024-01-24/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
